eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Ellis, KS; AT 04:31 AM ON SEP 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:31 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: From Kansas Highway Patrol: 2200 Block of Downing (Hays, KS) is now safe.  Investigation will be on-going. From Kansas Highway Patrol: 2200 Block of Downing (Hays,KS) is now safe.  Investigation will be on-going.
